full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 751 Filed 08/10/22 Page 86 of 261 1247 LC6Cmax3 Kate - cross 1 here? 2 MS. POMERANTZ: Objection, your Honor. 3 THE COURT: Sustained. 4 Q. That statement that you made in this courthouse was after Epstein died; correct? 5 6 A. Yes. 7 Q. And you and a number of other people accusing Epstein of abuse were invited by a judge in this courthouse, named Judge Berman, to speak publicly; correct? 8 9 10 A. Yes. 11 Q. And you took that opportunity to speak publicly? 12 A. Yes. 13 Q. And you spoke publicly with regard to Jeffrey Epstein; 14 correct? 15 A. Yes. 16 Q. You did not speak with regard to Ghislaine Maxwell? 17 A. I did not. 18 Q. And right after that very day that you made that statement was the first time that you sat down with the government in connection with things that you were testifying to today; 19 20 21 correct? 22 A. Yes. 23 Q. And right after you sat down with the government, which was right after you had spoken publicly, you appeared on television with regard to your allegations; correct? 24 25 SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00012837
